Name: Has Part
Description: This field is used to record individually documented parts of the documented physical thing.

Name: Has Part Type
Description: This field is used to record part types for the documented physical thing.

Name: Part Count
Description: This field is use to record a part count for the documented physical thing.

Name: Part of Archival Unit
Description: This field is used to link the documented archival unit to another instance of archival unit of which it forms a part.
